docs.text: Analysis of COVID-19 GWAS summary statistics data This webpage will serve as a platform to post my analysis of COVID-19 GWAS summary statistics data. Contact Huwenbo Shi : hshi_AT_hsph.harvard.edu

docs.text: Trans-ethnic analysis of significant COVID-19 GWAS associations Here, I look at the allele frequencies of the genetic variants likely associated with COVID-19 in diverse populations, to assess the likelihood that the same associations can be reproduced in different populations. I downloaded 6 GWAS summary statistics data from COVID-19 Host Genetics Initiative . In detail, *
